mapper.select: select czybh, (select zzmc from xt_zzxx WHERE zzbm=xt_czyxx.zzbm limit 1) zzmc, zzbm, (select gwmc from xt_gwxx WHERE gwbh=xt_czyxx.gwbh limit 1) gwmc, gwbh, dlzh, dlmm, czygh, czymc, bgdhhm, sjhm, getDictName('xbdm', xbdm) as xbdm, csrq, zc, zw, dw, dlmmycwcs, dlmmzdcwcs, wzkf, getDictName('czyztdm', czyztdm) as czyztdm, ztbgsj, cjrbh, cjsj, czrbh, czsj, email, avatar from xt_czyxx where czybh = #{czybh}

select czybh, (select zzmc from xt_zzxx WHERE zzbm=xt_czyxx.zzbm limit 1) zzmc, zzbm, (select gwmc from xt_gwxx WHERE gwbh=xt_czyxx.gwbh limit 1) gwmc, gwbh, dlzh, dlmm, czygh, czymc, bgdhhm, sjhm, getDictName('xbdm', xbdm) as xbdm, csrq, zc, zw, dw, dlmmycwcs, dlmmzdcwcs, wzkf, getDictName('czyztdm', czyztdm) as czyztdm, ztbgsj, cjrbh, cjsj, czrbh, czsj, email, avatar from xt_czyxx where dlzh = #{dlzh}

select czybh, (select zzmc from xt_zzxx WHERE zzbm=xt_czyxx.zzbm limit 1) zzmc, zzbm, (select gwmc from xt_gwxx WHERE gwbh=xt_czyxx.gwbh limit 1) gwmc, gwbh, dlzh, dlmm, czygh, czymc, bgdhhm, sjhm, getDictName('xbdm', xbdm) as xbdm, csrq, zc, zw, dw, dlmmycwcs, dlmmzdcwcs, wzkf, getDictName('czyztdm', czyztdm) as czyztdm, ztbgsj, cjrbh, cjsj, czrbh, czsj, email, avatar from xt_czyxx
1 = 1
and ( czymc LIKE CONCAT('%','${findtext}','%') or dlzh LIKE CONCAT('%','${findtext}','%') or sjhm LIKE CONCAT('${findtext}','%') )
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(*) from xt_czyxx
1 = 1
and ( czymc LIKE CONCAT('%','${findtext}','%') or dlzh LIKE CONCAT('%','${findtext}','%') or sjhm LIKE CONCAT('${findtext}','%') )
mapper.insert: insert into xt_czyxx(czybh,zzbm, gwbh, dlzh, dlmm, czygh, czymc, bgdhhm, sjhm, xbdm, csrq, zc, zw, dw, dlmmycwcs, dlmmzdcwcs, wzkf, czyztdm, ztbgsj, cjrbh, cjsj, czrbh, czsj, email, avatar) values (#{czybh},#{zzbm}, #{gwbh}, #{dlzh}, #{dlmm}, #{czygh}, #{czymc}, #{bgdhhm}, #{sjhm}, #{xbdm}, #{csrq}, #{zc}, #{zw}, #{dw}, #{dlmmycwcs}, #{dlmmzdcwcs}, #{wzkf}, #{czyztdm}, #{ztbgsj}, #{cjrbh}, #{cjsj}, #{czrbh}, #{czsj}, #{email}, #{avatar})
mapper.update:
update xt_czyxx
zzbm = #{zzbm},
gwbh = #{gwbh},
dlzh = #{dlzh},
dlmm = #{dlmm},
czygh = #{czygh},
czymc = #{czymc},
bgdhhm = #{bgdhhm},
sjhm = #{sjhm},
xbdm = #{xbdm},
csrq = #{csrq},
zc = #{zc},
zw = #{zw},
dw = #{dw},
dlmmycwcs = #{dlmmycwcs},
dlmmzdcwcs = #{dlmmzdcwcs},
wzkf = #{wzkf},
czyztdm = #{czyztdm},
ztbgsj = #{ztbgsj},
cjrbh = #{cjrbh},
cjsj = #{cjsj},
czrbh = #{czrbh},
czsj = #{czsj},
email = #{email},
avatar = #{avatar},
where czybh = #{czybh}
